entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Pelican Narrows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:32 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Island Falls 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -7.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -9.3°C
Wind: S 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this morning. Periods of freezing rain over southern sections this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
